Configuring SNMP System Information

Note Before you can use SNMP, install SNMP software on your computer. Your device supports only SNMPv3 for SNMP management and SNMPv1/2/3 for SNMP trap messages.

To enable SNMP:

 1. Choose Administration > SNMP.

 2. Check Enable to enable SNMP.

 3. Check Enable to Allow user access via Internet or Allow user access via VPN.

 4. Select the SNMP version in the Mode field.

 5. Enter this information:

SysContact

Enter the name of the contact person for this device. For example, your network administrator.

SysLocation

Enter the physical location of the device. For example, Rack #2, 4th Floor.

SysName

Enter a name to identify your device easily. For example, RTR 141.

 6. Click Save.
